REQ : Aerosoft Cessna 185F Bush Version (FS9)
PS - how do i activate the parachute effect?

Well for the parachute effect all i can say is it is in the manual. All the shortcuts are on the bottom of the page. 

USEFUL KEYS
SHIFT-E : MAIN DOOR OPEN / CLOSE (PRESS 2 AND 3 AFTER PRESSING
SHIFT-E TO OPEN TROOP
DOOR AND CARGO RAMP)
G : GEAR UP /DOWN
L : LIGHTS ON / OFF
F2-F4 : THROTTLE IDLE / %100 (HOLD F2 TO REVERSE THROTTLE)
F5-F8 : FLAPS
CTRL-E : START ENGINES
, : SPOILER / AIRBRAKE
S : SWITCH VIEW
A : ALTERNATIVE VIEW (FSX ONLY)

What do I have to do in order to play this?
@Duderude01: This is an aircraft addon for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2004. You need to install that first.
